quest.name: Wood You Believe It
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened is in urgent need of timber.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Gyorin.
Deliver the Yanxian timber to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to GyorinMine [Error] to the south of ReunionGather [Error] to the south of ReunionCatch [Error] at Nem Khaal.
Deliver the Yanxian timber to Seigetsu the Enlightened.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: It appears a miscalculation has been made. But not by me─ Perish the thought!

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The amount of timber we require for the festival far exceeds that which can be harvested within a reasonable distance of Dhoro Iloh. As you can see, although the Azim Steppe has an abundance of grass, trees are few and far between.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: As luck would have it, Gyorin has arrived in Reunion, bearing timber to barter for local goods. I took the liberty of arranging for you to meet him. However, I will leave the particulars of the trade to you.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename! What a pleasant surprise!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: I never imagined that you would be the one sent by Seigetsu the Egregious, or whatever he calls himself. Without further ado, let's get down to business, shall we? Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Back again, Forename? Need some more wood, do you?

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: I'm not sure why you're still running errands for Seigetsu the Intolerable. Having said that, I am always thrilled to do business with one as well-mannered as yourself!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: I come in search of goods that my clients at The New Rich would find intriguing, and more importantly, be willing to purchase.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: I notice that many inhabitants of the Azim Steppe wear exquisitely crafted necklaces that I believe would fetch a high price. I'd like you to craft enough pieces to make one. I can take care of the rest, yes, yes.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: During my travels through the Azim Steppe, I have seen a variety of distinctive zukin, or “headdresses,” as you might call them. I'd like you to craft enough pieces to make one. I can take care of the rest, yes, yes.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Some of the locals partake in the imbibing of kumis. I have obtained a quantity of mare's milk, but I gather the fermentation process is rather complicated and involves a lot of stirring. Perhaps you can prepare the basic ingredients, yes, yes?

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: The rocky outcrops in the southern parts of the Azim Steppe contain gems unlike those seen anywhere else, known as raw azimite. Bring a finful of these rarities to me and the timber is yours!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: The southern parts of the Azim Steppe are home to a valuable species of steppe candyfruit. Bring a few of these to me and the timber is yours!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: The Nem Khaal is teeming with rainbow killifish, native to this region. I'd like a sample to show my customers. Just one will suffice, yes, yes! I heard they like salmon roe, so try using that as bait.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: I'll watch over the merchandise until you return.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: You need more materials? Help yourself─ There are plenty more.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: You need more materials? Help yourself─ There are plenty more.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Was there a problem with the fermentation? Not stirring vigorously enough, perhaps? I have more ingredients, so use as much as you need.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: How goes your search?

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: How goes your search?

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Have any of those rainbow killifish found their way onto your hook yet?

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Have you brought the goods I seek?

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Perfect! Now production of authentic local goods can begin!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Customers from far and wide will flock to The New Rich for such fine wares. Yes, yes!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: If I can ensure a steady flow of stock from the Azim Steppe, my profits will go through the roof!

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: You've kept your part of the bargain, so I will do likewise. This finest-quality Yanxian timber now belongs to the Seven Hundred Seventy-Seven.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Be sure to tell Seigetsu the Insufferable that I am willing to supply further shipments, although I would prefer to avoid dealing directly with that pompous nincompoop.

dialogue.name: GYORIN
dialogue.text: Can I rely on you to act as our intermediary, our go-between?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Would I be correct in assuming that our business with Gyorin has come to a satisfactory conclusion?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Ah, superlative work, Forename! While Gyorin may be an unsophisticated boor, his mercantile acumen is commendable, and he no doubt has access to other wares that would benefit our cause.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: As for the timber, I will put it to good use. And by that, I mean order my underlings to put it to good use.
